attributes.description: THIS VEHICLE IS ABSOLUTELY SPOTLESS. Impossible to a fault one owner since new, FullService History, EVERY SERVICE COMPLETED ON SCHEDULE AND UP TO DATE WITH BMW THIS IS THE DREAM SPEC FOR A 3 SERIES Mineral White Metallic, Red Leather Upholstery is like new and finished with Aluminum, Extras include FULL MSPORT PACKAGE, GLASS SUNROOF, BMW XENON HEADLIGHT PACKAGE, 19 BMW MSPORT LIGHT ALLOY WHEELS MultiFunctional MSport Leather Steering with paddle shift, MSports Seats Package, Park Distance Control, Harmon Kardon sound system, Keyless Go, Cruise Control With Brake Function, Rain Sensor, Blue Tooth Connectivity Package with USB Interface, Auto Armor Smash and Grab Safety Film, etc. Perfectly Looked after and maintained by a previous responsible owner.. The 3 series is transformed when you add an MSPORT package, almost unrecognizable to the standard version of this car, then add a Sunroof, 19 WHEELS, and xenon lights and you have a very speciallooking vehicle indeed. JUST SO STUNNING IN THIS COMBINATION The twinscroll turbo on the 328i really makes this vehicle go like a rocket and yet economical at the same time, cannot compare to the 320i. Impossible to find a CLEANER, 3 SERIES MSPORT WITH SUCH LOW MILEAGE AND COMPREHENSIVE AGENT SERVICE HISTORY AVAILABLE IN THIS PRICE RANGE ANYWHERE IN SA must be seen to be appreciated Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security DEKRA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE
